cubicweb

Package devtools

source code

Test tools for cubicweb
Submodules [hide private]
  • cubicweb.devtools.cwtwill: cubicweb extensions for twill
  • cubicweb.devtools.cwwindmill: this module contains base classes for windmill integration
  • cubicweb.devtools.dataimport
  • cubicweb.devtools.devctl: additional cubicweb-ctl commands and command handlers for cubicweb and cubicweb's cubes development
  • cubicweb.devtools.fake: Fake objects to ease testing of cubicweb without a fully working environment
  • cubicweb.devtools.fill: This modules defines func / methods for creating test repositories
  • cubicweb.devtools.htmlparser: defines a validating HTML parser used in web application tests
  • cubicweb.devtools.httptest: this module contains base classes and utilities for integration with running http server
  • cubicweb.devtools.livetest: provide utilies for web (live) unit testing
  • cubicweb.devtools.qunit
  • cubicweb.devtools.realdbtest
  • cubicweb.devtools.repotest: some utilities to ease repository testing
  • cubicweb.devtools.stresstester: Usage: %s [OPTIONS] <instance id> <queries file>
  • cubicweb.devtools.testlib: this module contains base classes and utilities for cubicweb tests

install_sqlite_patch(querier)
This patch hotfixes the following sqlite bug : - http://www.sqlite.org/cvstrac/tktview?tn=1327,33 (some dates are returned as strings rather thant date objects)		 source code
